item.title: FT Most Read: Saturday, September 21, 2024 at 5:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. ‘Big Short’ fund manager Eisman put on ‘indefinite leave’ after Gaza comments
2. Israel kills elite Hizbollah commanders in Beirut strike, IDF says
3. [Opinion] Young women are starting to leave men behind
4. World economy faces pressures similar to 1920s slump, warns Lagarde
5. Trump’s North Carolina protégé under fire over ‘black Nazi’ porn claims
item.guid: FT Most Read: Saturday, September 21, 2024 at 5:15 AM UTC
